post:
This is a continuation of our previous 2GB special - we've managed to release more stock on this plan so grab it while you can :)

All of these plans are provisioned on new E3 nodes brought on line especially for this promotion! There is a limited stock supply so get them while you can!

If you've got any questions just let us know via PM on here, LiveChat on our site via email on hello@minivps.co.uk.
